name: SGDS
description: The Singapore Government Design System (SGDS) provides a common set of UI components, patterns and templates that allow agencies to create fast, accessible, and mobile-friendly digital services.

documentations.name: Getting Started with SGDS
documentations.description: Information to start developing digital services, product and portal with SGDS

documentations.name: SGDS Templates
documentations.description: Basic templates that you can use to start building your digital service, product or portal
